column2:
do you think they'll figure out it was a ruse?"
"Who knows." He looked up from stoking the fireplace
column3: where nothing but embers remained. "Tanzan Mino may be a genius
column4: but the rest of his Yakuza hoods are not exactly rocket scientists."

column1: 0109|nine minutes past one|They made an unostentatious exit from their coach
column3: when the express had rolled on into the west
column4: upon a station platform in a foreign city at nine minutes past one o'clock in the morning - but at length without their shadow.
